datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to algorithms, data patterns, and artificial intelligence.

columns.name: incorporates_AI_enhancements
columns.description: Indicates if the model incorporates artificial intelligence enhancements

columns.name: requires_complex_features
columns.description: Indicates if the dataset requires complex feature types like polynomial or interaction features to model.

columns.name: algorithm_upgrade_threshold
columns.description: Minimum threshold of improvements needed for considering an algorithm upgrade

columns.name: model_accuracy
columns.description: Accuracy of the machine learning model

columns.name: pretrained_models_count
columns.description: Number of pretrained models integrated into the dataset creation process

columns.name: performance_stability
columns.description: Measure of how stable the model's performance is over different datasets

columns.name: uses_feature_scaling
columns.description: Indicates whether feature scaling is applied to the input features

columns.name: model_complexity
columns.description: Categorical measure of model complexity (low, medium, high)

columns.name: feature_count
columns.description: Number of features in the dataset

columns.name: spans_multiple_time_zones
columns.description: Indicates if the data collection covers multiple time zones

columns.name: response_urgency
columns.description: Categorical urgency of responding to data input, ranging from low to critical

columns.name: uses_dropout
columns.description: Indicates whether dropout regularization is used in the model

columns.name: data_diversity_score
columns.description: Numerical measure of the diversity of the training dataset

columns.name: adaptive_learning
columns.description: Indicates if the model can adaptively learn from incoming data in real-time

columns.name: computational_complexity_percentile
columns.description: Percentile ranking of models based on computational complexity

columns.name: computation_load_ratio
columns.description: Ratio of system's computation power to model's computation demand

columns.name: input_sensitivity
columns.description: Measure of how much output changes in response to changes in input

columns.name: has_special_characters_in_name
columns.description: Indicates if the dataset name includes special characters (e.g., @, #, $).

columns.name: dataset_size
columns.description: Represents the total number of records in the dataset.

columns.name: algorithm_depth
columns.description: Depth of the trees or layers in the algorithm

columns.name: includes_time_series
columns.description: Indicates if the dataset includes time-series data

columns.name: percentage_of_binary_features
columns.description: The percentage of features in the dataset that are binary.

columns.name: data_size
columns.description: Size of the dataset used

columns.name: processing_time
columns.description: Time taken to train the model

columns.name: application_type
columns.description: Type of application using the model

columns.name: average_user_rating
columns.description: Average rating provided by users on the complexity and utility of the dataset.

columns.name: data_coverage_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of total possible data points actually present in the dataset.

columns.name: feature_extraction_technique
columns.description: Type of feature extraction applied in the model

columns.name: data_noise_level
columns.description: Amount of noise in the input data, rated on a scale

columns.name: algorithm_type
columns.description: Type of machine learning algorithm used

columns.name: data_type_diversity
columns.description: Counts the number of unique data types used in the dataset

columns.name: includes_image_data
columns.description: Indicates if the dataset includes image data

columns.name: data_update_frequency
columns.description: Frequency of data updates needed by the application, measured in updates per minute

queries.question: What is the relationship between the number of features in a dataset, the count of pretrained models used, the presence of image data, inclusion of time series data, and the dataset's base feature count?
queries.true_hypothesis: The number of features in a dataset can be estimated by adding 10 times the count of pretrained models used (quantitative) and 15 times the indicator for dataset including time-series data, to that dataset's base feature count.
